title: Editorialist Brand Classification
description: Schema for categorizing fashion brands and estimating Editorialist stylist preference

brand.description: Input brand name as provided by the user

watches.description: True if the brand produces watches

jewelry.description: True if the brand produces jewelry

shoes.description: True if the brand produces shoes

clothing.description: True if the brand produces clothing

bags.description: True if the brand produces bags

beauty.description: True if the brand produces beauty products

other.description: True if the brand produces other fashion items

certainty_score.description: Certainty score from 0 (no confidence) to 100 (high confidence)

notes.description: Brief notes only if there is uncertainty about category or preference; otherwise empty string
